name: Health and indoor air quality
location: This stream will take place in (room to be confirmed)
description: Maintaining healthy indoor air quality in buildings which are becoming more and more airtight is becoming an important issue, especially for multi-occupancy buildings. This session examines the design, operational and occupant wellbeing issues around air tightness, natural and mechanical ventilation and air quality in both domestic and non-domestic buildings.

presentations.name: Air tightness, ventilation, overheating and healthy indoor air quality
presentations.speakers: Lynne Sullivan, Architect & Co-founding Partner, SustainableBYDesign

presentations.name: Indoor environments in non-domestic buildings
presentations.speakers: Dr Andy Dengel, Head of Environmental Engineering & Consultancy, Building Technology Group, BRE

presentations.name: Maintaining healthy indoor air quality in low energy homes
presentations.speakers: Melissa Taylor, Technical Associate, The Good Homes Alliance

presentations.name: MVHR and indoor air quality - a tale of two developments
presentations.speakers: Marie Riordan, New Business Manager, Saxon Weald
